{{Infobox National football team | Name = Italy Under 17 | Badge = | Badge_size = 125px | FIFA Trigramme = ITA | Nickname = | Association = <span lang="it" xml:lang="it">''[[Italian Football Federation|Federazione Italiana Giuoco Calcio]]'' | Confederation = [[UEFA]] ([[Europe]]) | Coach = [[Daniele Zoratto]] | Captain = | Most caps = | Top scorer = <!-- First Kit --> | pattern_la1 = _Ita08h | pattern_b1 = _Ita08h | pattern_ra1 = _Ita08h | leftarm1 = 0066bc | body1 = FFFFFF | rightarm1 = 0066bc | shorts1 = FFFFFF | socks1 = 0000FF <!-- Second Kit --> | pattern_la2 = | pattern_b2 = _Ita08a | pattern_ra2 = | pattern_so2 = | leftarm2 = FFFFFF | body2 = FFFFFF | rightarm2 = FFFFFF | shorts2 = FFFFFF | socks2 = FFFFFF }} The '''Italy national U-17 football team''' is the national under-17 [[Association football|football]] team of [[Italy]] and is controlled by the [[Italian Football Federation]].
The team competes in the [[UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship]], held every year.
==UEFA U-17 Championship Record== * [[2002 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship|2002]]: ''Did not qualify'' * [[2003 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship|2003]]: 3rd group stage B * [[2004 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship|2004]]: ''Did not qualify'' * [[2005 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship|2005]]: Third place * [[2006 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship|2006]]: ''Elite Round'' * [[2007 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship|2007]]: ''Elite Round'' * [[2008 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship|2008]]: ''Elite Round'' * [[2009 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship|2009]]: Semi-finals * [[2010 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship|2010]]: ''Qualifying Round'' * [[2011 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship|2011]]: ''Elite Round''
==FIFA U-17 World Cup Record== * [[1985 FIFA U-16 World Championship|1985]]: 3rd group stage C * [[1987 FIFA U-16 World Championship|1987]]: Fourth place * [[1989 FIFA U-17 World Championship|1989]]: ''Did not qualify'' * [[1991 FIFA U-17 World Championship|1991]]: 3rd group stage A * [[1993 FIFA U-17 World Championship|1993]]: 4th group stage A * [[1995 FIFA U-17 World Championship|1995]]: ''Did not qualify'' * [[1997 FIFA U-17 World Championship|1997]]: ''Did not qualify'' * [[1999 FIFA U-17 World Championship|1999]]: ''Did not qualify'' * [[2001 FIFA U-17 World Championship|2001]]: ''Did not qualify'' * [[2003 FIFA U-17 World Championship|2003]]: ''Did not qualify'' * [[2005 FIFA U-17 World Championship|2005]]: 3rd group stage C * [[2007 FIFA U-17 World Cup|2007]]: ''Did not qualify'' * [[2009 FIFA U-17 World Cup|2009]]: Quarter-finals * [[2011 FIFA U-17 World Cup|2011]]: ''Did not qualify''
==Honours== *'''[[UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship|European Under-16 Football Championship]]''' :*'''Winner:''' 1982
*'''[[FIFA U-17 World Cup]]''' :* Fourth Place: [[1987 FIFA U-16 World Championship|1987]]
==Current squad== Squad called up for the ''FA Tournament'' against [[England national under-17 football team|England]], [[Portugal national under-17 football team|Portugal]] and [[Czech Republic national under-21 football team|Czech Republic]] from 24 to 28 August 2011.
